origin: Whispers, secrets, and lies... #name# slept with the #occupation#.
Whispers, secrets, and lies... tension increases between #name# and the #occupation#.
The #occupation# is drafting a report... ' #adj# #noun#: #adv# #verb# in archaeology '. It's not working.
#name# was working on the Harris Matrix. It may have released #deities#
'The archaeology of #noun#: the #adj# #noun# approach.' ...#name# scrunches up the paper, throws it away in disgust.
'The archaeology of #noun#: the #adj# #noun# approach.' ...'yeah, this works! yeah!' thinks #name# .
The #occupation# is hiding the #noun# in the dirt, muttering, '#name# can go screw it'...
activity: going to wreak terrible revenge on the others.
blissfully unaware that anything could be wrong.
drawing another piece of damned brick.
loving every moment of the experience.
origin2: #name# and the #occupation# set out that morning to do some survey work... #archaeologists##preface##defs##mountains##ending#
